A4.text: Dusty Baker was the manager of the Giants from 1993 to 2002.

A5.text: Bruce Bochy would later eclipse him alongside managing the Giants to World Series titles in 2010, 2012, and 2014.

A6.text: On October 27, 2006, Bochy agreed to a three-year contract to replace Felipe Alou and become the Giants' new manager, their 38th in franchise history.

A7.text: Bochy became the Giants' manager in 2007, succeeding Felipe Alou.
